title: Monster Karaoke
content: Unleash your monstrous voice and sing your favorite songs with friends… if you dare! 🎤👻

title: Tarot Reading
content: Discover the mysteries of your future with the skilled hands of our tarot reader. Magic and chills guaranteed! 🔮🕯️

title: Costume contest
content: Show off your most creative costume and join the spookiest contest of the year! 🧛‍♂️🎭

title: Photo spots
content: Capture yourself in our Halloween-themed photo spots: coffin, tombstones, and plenty of spooky atmosphere! 📸

title: Live caricature artist
content: Take home a fun memory! Vitamyna Caricaturista will turn you and your friends into spooky caricatures! 🎨👹
